abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information related to finite element analysis and analysis selection

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of information related to finite element analysis and analysis selection

inscope.li: output information applying to a whole model;

outscope.li: analyses other than those based upon finite elements.
